title: can azir please be able to move when he orders his soldiers to attack
body:
azir sucks ass right now because he has to be standing still in order to target someone to attack with his sand soldiers

this is extremely stupid

so now im a sitting duck while that whole animation is going on and people can hit me with cc no problem.

with how mobile this game has gotten azir can not eveen hope to survive and do well in this game at its current state

he is far to immobile people will say he has a dash but its a high cooldown and high mana cost

his mana costs on all hsi spells  is another thing but

in lane azir cant survive because of his dumb ass mechanic that makes him stand still while he autos

another thing that could really help azir is some visual clarity on where exactly is the range in which he can order soliders to attack

this really shouldnt be so hard to do please do it riot

replies.body: Bait?  Everyone has to stand still to auto, this isn't some new mechanic for azir.
